# DataBlockData Equality operator

Implements the equality operator (==).

```csharp
public static bool operator ==(DataBlockData left, DataBlockData right)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| left | Operand 1 |
| right | Operand 2 |

## Return Value

Returns true if `left` is equal to `right`; false otherwise.
